content: 1 fits the whole fam materials size 5 5mm us9 for brim and size 6mm us 10 for body of hat use your favor- ite method for knit- ting in the round approx 400 yds of fingering weight yarn held triple gauge using larger needles in 1x1 rib in the round 12sts and 22 row in 4 inches abbreviations decreases work 1 round as they present k knit p purl work all stitches as they present work 4 sts s2ppo work 3 sts s2ppo sts stitches themselves unless otherwise stat- work 2 sts s2kpo work 2 sts s2ppo ed all decreases are worked over work 3 sts s2ppo work 3 sts s2ppo pm place marker 3 stitches some decreases will use work 2 sts s2kpo work 2 sts s2ppo 1x1 ribbing *k1 p1* repeat around the first stitch from the next row using the 1st st from next row s2kpo sl2sts as if to k2tog k1 pass becoming new last stitch work 2 sts s2kpo work 1 sts s2kpo slipped stitches over work 14 stitches s2kpo work 13 s2ppo s2kpo work 1 st s2kpo s2ppo wyif sl2 sts as if to p2tog tbl stitches s2kpo work 15 sts s2kpo work 1 st s2kpo s2ppo s2kpo p1 pass slipped stitches over work 13 stitches s2kpo p1 using 1st st from next row work one round as stitches present cut a tail leaving a few inches themselves draw through remaining sts on pattern starts here needle and cinch tight work 13 sts s2ppo work 11 sts s2p- with smaller needles cast on 68 sts po work 13 sts s2ppo work 11 sts we hope you enjoyed this knit and pm and join in the round being we would love to see it use the s2ppo careful not to twist your stitches #fitsthewholefamhat and tag us work in 1x1 ribbing for 4 inches work one round as they present on instagram @cozyupknits switch to larger needles and con- work 12 sts s2kpo work 9 sts s2k- can t wait to see how you make tinue in 1x1 ribbing for approx po work 11 sts s2kpo work 9 sts this your own s2kpo using the 1st st from next 5 9 total from cast on happy knitting row fits the whole fam by cozy up knits 2 pattern support email us at cozyupknits@gmail com fits the whole fam by cozy up knits
